description: This file defines data models for messages and attachments within a chat application backend, including entity properties and relationships.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Represents a message sent by a user within a conversation, including content, sender, time sent, and associated attachments.

classes.name: Attachment
classes.description: Represents an attachment file associated with a message, such as an image or document.

methods.name: Message constructor
methods.description: Initializes a new Message object with a generated unique identifier and default sent time.

methods.name: Attachment constructor
methods.description: Initializes a new Attachment object with a generated unique identifier.
